mapper.insert: insert into board values(null, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, now(), ifnull((select max(b.group_no)+1 from board b),0), 1, 1, #{userNo})
mapper.select: select b.no as no,name,title,contents,hit,reg_date as regDate, group_no as groupNo, order_no as orderNo ,depth, user_no as userNo from user a, board b where a.no = b.user_no order by groupNo desc, orderNo asc limit #{begin},5
select no,title,contents,reg_date as regDate from board where title = #{title} and reg_date as regDate= #{regDate}
select no,title,contents, reg_date as regDate, group_no as groupNo, order_no as orderNo, depth, user_no as userNo from board where no = #{no }
select no,title,contents,reg_date as regDate from board where title = #{title} and contents = #{contents}
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where no = #{no }
mapper.delete: delete from board where no=#{no} and title=#{title}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title }, contents=#{contents } where no=#{no}
